Class

HankoError

HankoError(code, causeopt)

Every error thrown in the SDK is an instance of 'HankoError'. The value of the 'code' property is eligible to translate the error into an error message.
Constructor

# new HankoError(code, causeopt)

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
code string An error code that refers to the error instance.
cause Error <optional>
 The original error
